name: StarCraft: Ghost
description: ~~Canceled~~StarCraft: Ghost refines the experience of StarCraft to the level of the individual soldier. Now you can engage the StarCraft universe face-to-face as one of the Dominion's deadly Ghost operatives. You'll have magnified strength, agility, and speed, as well as psionic abilities. With the help of your allies, you'll follow story-driven missions that take you from intense planetary battles to an unexpected turn of events that leaves the fate of the universe in your hands.
